name: Diver Showdown
description:
What is Diver Showdown?

Diver Showdown is a 3D multiplayer pang-based fighting game. The players are divers who blow bubbles to gain energy and attack the opponent.

How to play?
  • Move around using WASD
  • Use W to jump
  • Use Q to attack. If the ball is your colour you throw it towards another player to attack.
  • Exploding balls and attacking the opposite fills up the energy bar. Use E to throw tree balls at the opposite.
  • Balls of the opposite colour are harmful
  • The white balls are neutral, they do not harm
Features
  • You can play online or local
  • You can use keyboard and mouse or any controller
  • Player number is 2
Play with your friends!

You can create a room to play with your friend or write the name of a room to connect. 

Creators
  • Gismo, 3D artist
  • Yai, graphic design
  • Sergi, programmer
  • Adrià, programmer
  • Alex, programmer
Play the game, give us your opinion and enjoy! Thanks!
